TheCursedMod:AbyssShockwave.NAME: Abyss Shockwave
TheCursedMod:AbyssShockwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have any Curse in your hand, deal same damage again.

TheCursedMod:AntiAging.NAME: Anti-Aging
TheCursedMod:AntiAging.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ritual : Raise your max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:BlessingInDisguise.NAME: Blessing in Disguise
TheCursedMod:BlessingInDisguise.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand. NL Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted.

TheCursedMod:BloodBarrier.NAME: Blood Barrier
TheCursedMod:BloodBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Gain Block equal to your max HP minus your current HP. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:CircleOfAbyss.NAME: Circle of Abyss
TheCursedMod:CircleOfAbyss.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a card, gain !M! Block. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain [E].
TheCursedMod:CircleOfAbyss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a card, gain !M! Block. NL If this card is Exhausted, NL gain [E] [E].

TheCursedMod:CircleOfAmplification.NAME: Circle of Amplification
TheCursedMod:CircleOfAmplification.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a Power card, draw 1 card. NL Ethereal.
TheCursedMod:CircleOfAmplification.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a Power card, gain [E] and draw 1 card. NL Ethereal.

TheCursedMod:CircleOfBlood.NAME: Circle of Blood
TheCursedMod:CircleOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play an Attack card, heal !M! HP. NL Ethereal.

TheCursedMod:CircleOfCorruption.NAME: Circle of Corruption
TheCursedMod:CircleOfCorruption.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a Skill card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

TheCursedMod:CircleOfFlame.NAME: Circle of Flame
TheCursedMod:CircleOfFlame.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play an Attack card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

TheCursedMod:CircleOfFocus.NAME: Circle of Focus
TheCursedMod:CircleOfFocus.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a card that costs !M! or more, gain [E].

TheCursedMod:CircleOfWindfury.NAME: Circle of Windfury
TheCursedMod:CircleOfWindfury.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a cost 0 card, draw 1 card. NL Ethereal.
TheCursedMod:CircleOfWindfury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a cost 0 card, draw 1 card.

TheCursedMod:CleanUpWorkshop.NAME: Clean up Workshop
TheCursedMod:CleanUpWorkshop.DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Gain !B! Block and draw !M! card.
TheCursedMod:CleanUpWorkshop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Gain !B! Block and draw !M! cards.

TheCursedMod:CollectTribute.NAME: Collect Tribute
TheCursedMod:CollectTribute.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and add a random Curse card into your hand.
TheCursedMod:CollectTribute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] and add a random Curse card into your hand.

TheCursedMod:CursedAmulet.NAME: Cursed Amulet
TheCursedMod:CursedAmulet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Shuffle a random Curse card into your draw pile.

TheCursedMod:CursedArmor.NAME: Cursed Armor
TheCursedMod:CursedArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile.

TheCursedMod:CursedBlade.NAME: Cursed Blade
TheCursedMod:CursedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheCursedMod:CursedBoomerang.NAME: Cursed Boomerang
TheCursedMod:CursedBoomerang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheCursedMod:CursedMace.NAME: Cursed Mace
TheCursedMod:CursedMace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheCursedMod:CursedRelics.NAME: Cursed Relics
TheCursedMod:CursedRelics.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of Relics you have. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheCursedMod:CursedShiv.NAME: Cursed Shiv
TheCursedMod:CursedShiv.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheCursedMod:CursedSpellbook.NAME: Cursed Spellbook
TheCursedMod:CursedSpellbook.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle a random Curse card into your draw pile.

TheCursedMod:CursedStaff.NAME: Cursed Staff
TheCursedMod:CursedStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 Dregs cards into your hand.

TheCursedMod:CursedWand.NAME: Cursed Wand
TheCursedMod:CursedWand.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheCursedMod:DemonSword.NAME: Demon Sword
TheCursedMod:DemonSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand and gain !M! Strength for each Exhausted card.

TheCursedMod:DemonicPact.NAME: Demonic Pact
TheCursedMod:DemonicPact.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Ritual card, draw 1 card.

TheCursedMod:DoubleShield.NAME: Double Shield
TheCursedMod:DoubleShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ritual : Next turn, gain !B! Block.

TheCursedMod:EmpowerCircles.NAME: Empower Circles
TheCursedMod:EmpowerCircles.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Circle card, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

TheCursedMod:Evocation.NAME: Evocation
TheCursedMod:Evocation.DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Remove all of your debuffs. NL Exhaust.
TheCursedMod:Evocation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Remove all of your debuffs. If there is no debuff, gain 1 Artifact. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:ForbiddenAlchemy.NAME: Forbidden Alchemy
TheCursedMod:ForbiddenAlchemy.DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Obtain an Entropic Brew potion. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:FuryStrike.NAME: Fury Strike
TheCursedMod:FuryStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of all Strike cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

TheCursedMod:Grudge.NAME: Grudge
TheCursedMod:Grudge.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Ritual card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:HellfireBreathing.NAME: Hellfire Breathing
TheCursedMod:HellfireBreathing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

TheCursedMod:HellsGateOpen.NAME: Hell's Gate Open
TheCursedMod:HellsGateOpen.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Cursed card into your hand.
TheCursedMod:HellsGateOpen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a random Cursed card into your hand.

TheCursedMod:Hemoplague.NAME: Hemoplague
TheCursedMod:Hemoplague.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! Bleed to ALL enemies.

TheCursedMod:LuckyCharm.NAME: Lucky Charm
TheCursedMod:LuckyCharm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Curse card is drawn or Exhausted, gain !M! Block.

TheCursedMod:ManaBullet.NAME: Mana Bullet
TheCursedMod:ManaBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Curse card in your hand.
TheCursedMod:ManaBullet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Unplayable card in your hand.

TheCursedMod:ManaCirculation.NAME: Mana Circulation
TheCursedMod:ManaCirculation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Curse card is Exhausted, gain [E]. NL Ethereal.
TheCursedMod:ManaCirculation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Curse card is Exhausted, gain [E].

TheCursedMod:Mangle.NAME: Mangle
TheCursedMod:Mangle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Bleed, NL gain [R] and NL draw 1 card.

TheCursedMod:Neurasthenia.NAME: Neurasthenia
TheCursedMod:Neurasthenia.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand. NL Enemy loses Strength by 1 plus the number of Exhausted cards. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:NeowsMight.NAME: Neow's Might
TheCursedMod:NeowsMight.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 this turn. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:Obscuration.NAME: Obscuration
TheCursedMod:Obscuration.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ritual : Gain !B! Block again.

TheCursedMod:OutForBlood.NAME: Out for Blood
TheCursedMod:OutForBlood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Bleed.

TheCursedMod:ParallelWorld.NAME: Parallel World
TheCursedMod:ParallelWorld.DESCRIPTION: Copy all cards in your hand and Shuffle them into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:PrepareRitual.NAME: Prepare Ritual
TheCursedMod:PrepareRitual.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of non-Curse cards, then add that many Dregs cards into your hand. NL Exhaust.
TheCursedMod:PrepareRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of non-Curse cards, then add that many Dregs cards into your hand.

TheCursedMod:RapidMovement.NAME: Rapid Movement
TheCursedMod:RapidMovement.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ritual : Draw !M! cards.

TheCursedMod:RavingStaff.NAME: Raving Staff
TheCursedMod:RavingStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

TheCursedMod:ReleasedKnowledge.NAME: Released Knowledge
TheCursedMod:ReleasedKnowledge.DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Add a random Circle card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
TheCursedMod:ReleasedKnowledge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Add a random Circle card into your hand.

TheCursedMod:SaltUponWound.NAME: Salt upon Wound
TheCursedMod:SaltUponWound.DESCRIPTION: Enemy immediately loses HP by its Bleed 2 times. NL Apply !M! Bleed.

TheCursedMod:ShockAndAwe.NAME: Shock and Awe
TheCursedMod:ShockAndAwe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile.

TheCursedMod:SmokeScreen.NAME: Smoke Screen
TheCursedMod:SmokeScreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ritual : Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

TheCursedMod:SoulCrush.NAME: Soul Crush
TheCursedMod:SoulCrush.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage.

TheCursedMod:SoulReap.NAME: Soul Reap
TheCursedMod:SoulReap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:SpitefulPlan.NAME: Spiteful Plan
TheCursedMod:SpitefulPlan.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse card, draw !M! card.
TheCursedMod:SpitefulPlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse card, draw !M! cards.

TheCursedMod:SpitefulPray.NAME: Spiteful Pray
TheCursedMod:SpitefulPray.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain additional [E]. NL Exhaust.
TheCursedMod:SpitefulPray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain additional [E]. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:SpitefulStrike.NAME: Spiteful Strike
TheCursedMod:SpitefulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain [E] [E].

TheCursedMod:SpreadPlague.NAME: Spread Plague
TheCursedMod:SpreadPlague.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Bleed and 3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:StingEye.NAME: Sting Eye
TheCursedMod:StingEye.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Bleed.

TheCursedMod:Stretching.NAME: Stretching
TheCursedMod:Stretching.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

TheCursedMod:StunningStrike.NAME: Stunning Strike
TheCursedMod:StunningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Stun. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:SurpriseAttack.NAME: Surprise Attack
TheCursedMod:SurpriseAttack.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:TacticalStrike.NAME: Tactical Strike
TheCursedMod:TacticalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card.
TheCursedMod:TacticalStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

TheCursedMod:TroublousMinions.NAME: Troublous Minions
TheCursedMod:TroublousMinions.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand. NL Gain !B! Block and add a Dregs card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

TheCursedMod:UltimatePain.NAME: Ultimate Pain
TheCursedMod:UltimatePain.DESCRIPTION: Enemy immediately loses HP by its Bleed X times.
TheCursedMod:UltimatePain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy immediately loses HP by its Bleed X+1 times.

TheCursedMod:VitalStrike.NAME: Vital Strike
TheCursedMod:VitalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Bleed, double the damage.

TheCursedMod:VoidForm.NAME: Void Form
TheCursedMod:VoidForm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a Curse, gain !M! Strength.

TheCursedMod:WearCloak.NAME: Wear Cloak
TheCursedMod:WearCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain [E].

TheCursedMod:Wield.NAME: Wield
TheCursedMod:Wield.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw cards equal to the number of Unplayable cards in your hand.
